data.quote: People aren't born ordinary but they choose to be ordinary
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Our dreams have to be bigger. Our ambitions higher. Our commitment deeper. And our efforts greater.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
data.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
data.author: Steven Covey

data.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
data.author: Confucious

data.quote: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
data.author: Jimmy Dean

data.quote: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel.
data.author: Demi Lovato

data.quote: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.
data.author: William James

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
data.author: Ella Fitzgerald

data.quote: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers.'
data.author: Amy Poehle

data.quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
data.author: C.S. Lewis
